header.job: I'm currently a Fullstack Software Engineer @ Lonestone.

about.title: About me
about.contentDev: Fullstack Software Engineer at Lonestone, I acquired these skills thanks to my experience in company as well as my background, after a DUT, a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and a Master's degree in web development.
about.contentExtra: Outside of web development, I am also passionate about cinema, photography and music, I don't practice any music but I can't do without listening to some every day. I've also been skateboarding for more than 10 years.
